full_summary:
**Tender Announcement #21510-248114**
==============================
### About This Announcement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) seeks a Mechanical HVAC Contractor for Standing Offer Services.

### Project Overview
This project involves undertaking general mechanical work, including Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC), at Correctional Service Canada (CSC) institutions.

### Key Details
- **Reference Number:** WS4469612197-Doc4469630360
- **Publication Date:** 2024-05-01
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-17T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** 2024-05-07 to 2027-05-06

### Solicitation Method
This tender is a Request for Standing Offer under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding, with a selection criteria of Lowest Price.

### Bidding Details
- **Bid Submission:** Mandatory supporting documentation and bid submissions are due by 2024-05-17T14:00:00.
- **Bid Evaluation:** Only compliant bids will be reviewed. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Project Locations
Bidding institutions include:
1) Stony Mountain Institution (SMI), Stony Mountain, MB
2) Osborne Community Correctional Centre (CCC), Winnipeg, MB

### Contact Information
Contract inquiries can be directed to:
Ben Wong, PSPC, at ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Or refer to the tender notice on Ariba Discovery: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19569392?extsite=MTk1NjkzOTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
